info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 5 at 9:49PM CDT until April 9 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport LA
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas...
Neches River Near Diboll affecting Polk, Tyler, Angelina, Houston and Trinity Counties.
For the Neches River...including Lake Palestine, Neches, Alto, Diboll, Rockland...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Neches River near Diboll.
* WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to Wednesday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding occurs. Expect flooded boat ramps and trails.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 12.5 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.6 feet on 03/24/1970. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: https://water.noaa.gov/wfo/SHV
The next statement will be issued Sunday evening at 1000 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON

area.areaDesc: Angelina, TX; Houston, TX; Polk, TX; Trinity, TX; Tyler, TX
